properties.address: Pocela Centre, East Riding of Yorkshire YO42 2QU
properties.description: East Riding libraries offer warm welcoming places, with comfy seating, books, games and jigsaws. Please check our website for service updates and any changes to our usual opening hours.
properties.title: Pocklington Pocela Centre

properties.address: The Wenlock Arms, Main Street, Wheldrake, York, YO19 6AA
properties.description: Every other term time Tuesday, 10am to 12pm - The Wenlock Arms, Main Street, Wheldrake, YO19 6AA - There is always tea, coffee, homemade cake and a warm welcome. No-one ever feels lonely coming to Sharing Life as you are met at the door by a committee member and if you are a newcomer you are introduced to friendly people who will make sure you have a sociable morning.

hours._text: Every other term time Tuesday, 10am to 12pm - The Wenlock Arms, Main Street, Wheldrake, YO19 6AA - There is always tea, coffee, homemade cake and a warm welcome.
